alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 5:26AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN BRADFORD... SOUTHEASTERN ALACHUA...NORTHWESTERN PUTNAM AND SOUTHWESTERN CLAY COUNTIES THROUGH 600 AM EDT... At 526 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Rochelle, or 10 miles southeast of Gainesville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Melrose, Hawthorne, George`s Lake, Lake Geneva, Florahome, Rochelle, Melrose Landing, and Orange Heights. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EDT for northern and northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam
